The breast center nurse coordinator said 48-72 hours, but like you said, the holiday weekend likely threw things off. I will definitely be calling again tomorrow, I don't care if I make a pest of myself.  I'm a Birads 5, so I'm prepared for the worst, hoping for the best...but I'm sure everyone on here understands... I just want to know and move on.  Thanks again for your input!
